description:
Jacksonville.com’s coverage of the University of Florida Gators goes beyond the headlines to bring you the depth of coverage that readers of The Florida Times-Union have come to expect. In this app, free for a limited time, users get the same coverage provided by Times-Union sports reporters on Jacksonville.com.  

You’ll never miss a beat while you’re away from your computer or newspaper.
1. Real-time access to the latest Gators news and information including stories, blogs, video and photo galleries.
2. No need to manually update.  Your application automatically refreshes with the latest content.
3. Ability to read and access content on a plane, bus, etc. without a network connection and/or save stories for later reading.
4. Customize your app through ‘My feeds” with other news and information important to you.
5. Share content via email or through social networking sites Facebook and Twitter.
